title: 19 Societal View
details: C Lu, K Chang, JB Patel, P Singh, J Kalpathy-Cramer - The Impact of Artificial Intelligence in …
abstract: Artificial intelligence (AI) technology promises to have a transformative impact on several areas of healthcare. In this chapter, some key implications of radiology AI are discussed. The first section introduces several new capabilities enabled by current AI …

title: Multi-resolution Guided 3D GANs for Medical Image Translation
details: J Ha, JS Park, D Crandall, E Garyfallidis, X Zhang - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.00575, 2024
abstract: Medical image translation is the process of converting from one imaging modality to another, in order to reduce the need for multiple image acquisitions from the same patient. This can enhance the efficiency of treatment by reducing the time …
